text: Hoffmannia ecuatoriana is a species of flowering plant in the family Rubiaceae. It is endemic to Ecuador. It is known from just a single collection made in 1944.Jaramillo, T., Cornejo, X. & Pitman, N. 2004. Hoffmannia ecuatoriana. The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species 2004. Downloaded on 22 November 2015. ==References== ecuatoriana Category:Endemic flora of Ecuador Category:Endangered plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Hoffmannia ecuatoriana
